mapper.insert: insert into photos (photo_id, p_id, photo_oname, photo_sname, photo_type, photo_role) values (#{photoId}, #{pId}, #{photoOname}, #{photoSname}, #{photoType}, #{photoRole})
mapper.update: update photos set photo_oname=#{photoOname}, photo_sname=#{photoSname}, photo_type=#{photoType}, photo_role=#{photoRole} where photo_id=#{photoId} and p_id=#{pId}
